laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: As of ___, WBCs were 60K, representing a tripling in WBC over 4 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 3% of cells were positive for CD38.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: On subsequent evaluation, 50% of B cells were CD38 positive.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Abnormalities for the D13S319 13q14.3 and P53 17p13.1 probes; 70/100 nuclei showed abnormalities.
Extensive granulation tissue along with mesothelial proliferation and hemosiderin-laden macrophages; no morphological evidence of large cell transformation or infection.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CLL was felt to be a ‘bystander’ and not the cause of the pleural effusion.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Rise in ___ B5 antibody to a level of 32.
Blood cultures, urine culture, CMV viral load, adenovirus PCR, EBV PCR, Parvo 19 DNA negative and HHV-8 PCR and respiratory viral screen and cultures were all negative.
Marked improvement with near complete resolution of ground glass lung opacities.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Prompting discontinuation of voriconazole therapy for aspergillosis.
